name: The Far Side - Daily Dose
author: Gary Larson
description: Five rotating classic Far Side comics, updated daily at midnight Pacific time. Each day features a new selection from Gary Larson's iconic single-panel cartoons.

name: The Far Side - New Stuff
author: Gary Larson
description: New digital artwork by Gary Larson, created since his return to cartooning. Updates are sporadic - new comics appear when Gary creates them (typically weeks or months between releases).
